content: yarn and hook size not specified note from the designer an advantage of this pattern for using bits of yarn is that since there is no end to row or rounds you can just tie on a new yarn when your previous yarn ends you can also alternate yarns round by round to make it look stripey fun yarns can be included for a row or two to give the square interesting texture pattern available in english 1 and french 2 1 http //www knit-a-square com/sites/default/files/crochet_square_chain_stitch pdf 2 http //www knit-a-square com/sites/default/files/crochet_square_chain_stitch_fr pdf
